QAPair.Question: What is (are) Irritable bowel syndrome - aftercare ?
QAPair.Answer: Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) is a disorder that leads to abdominal pain and bowel changes. Your health care provider will talk about things you can do at home to manage your condition.

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional

QAPair.Question: Do I need to see a doctor for Irritable bowel syndrome - aftercare ?
